Question: Helper Robotics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Helper Robotics

Motion Pillow

- Uses AI to tackle snoring problems and improve sleep quality
- Motion System detects snoring and adjusts airbags to open airways
- App tracks sleep data and offers real-time sleep monitoring
- Available for $699 with a 40% discount during CES

Bmind Smart Mirror

- AI-powered smart mirror for mental wellness
- Provides personalized recommendations for mood improvement
- Offers light therapy, guided meditation, and self-affirmations
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Award Honoree

Minitailz Smart Dog Collar

- Fitness tracker for dogs with GPS location and health stats monitoring
- Detects early signs of heart failure and offers AI-driven activity detection
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Award Honoree

Yarbo Multi-Purpose Intelligent Yard Robot

- Family of products for yard maintenance including lawn mower and snow blower
- All products work with the same power docking station
- Newer models available for pre-order

Wim

- Assists in walking and exercising with personalized AI coaching
- Helps improve walking performance and provides customized programs
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree

Holobox

- Enables hologram communication with real-life hologram display
- Offers "plug and play" system for easy setup
- Desktop version available as Holobox Mini

Ecovacs Deebot X2 Combo robot + stick vacuum

- Robot vacuum integrated with stick vacuum for comprehensive cleaning
- Matter-certified wireless stick vacuum with 8000Pa of suction
- Available at the end of March for $1,599

Nimble Beauty

- AI-powered at-home nail salon device for manicures
- Offers convenience and professional-quality results
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree

Ballie

- Revamped household assistant robot with new capabilities and AI features
- Can project video and manage home appliances
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree

Moonbird

- Device for stress reduction through guided breathing exercises
- Monitors heart rate and offers stress-reducing breathing exercises
- Available for purchase at $199
Summary_cn:
Helper Robotics

动作枕

- 利用人工智能解决打鼾问题，提高睡眠质量
- 动作系统检测打鼾并调整气囊以保持通畅呼吸
- 应用程序跟踪睡眠数据并提供实时睡眠监测
- 在CES期间享受40%的折扣，售价为699美元

Bmind智能镜子

- 用于心理健康的人工智能智能镜子
- 提供个性化建议以改善心情
- 提供光疗、引导冥想和自我肯定
- 荣获2024年CES创新奖提名

Minitailz智能狗项圈

- 适用于狗的健康统计和GPS定位的健身追踪器
- 发现心力衰竭的早期迹象，并提供AI驱动的活动检测
- 荣获2024年CES创新奖提名

Yarbo多功能智能庭院机器人

- 用于庭院维护的产品系列，包括割草机和除雪机
- 所有产品可与同一电源停靠站一起使用
- 新款产品可进行预订

Wim

- 辅助行走和运动，提供个性化的人工智能指导
- 帮助改善行走表现并提供定制方案
- 荣获2024年CES创新奖提名

Holobox

- 实现与真实全息图的通信
- 提供“即插即用”的系统，易于设置
- 可以购买桌面版本的Holobox Mini

Ecovacs Deebot X2组合机器人+立式吸尘器

- 整合了机器人吸尘器和立式吸尘器，进行全面清洁
- 拥有8000Pa的吸力的Matter认证无线立式吸尘器
- 将于3月底上市，售价为1599美元

Nimble Beauty

- 用于在家修指甲的人工智能设备
- 提供便利和专业效果
- 荣获2024年CES创新奖提名

Ballie

- 经过改进的家庭助理机器人，具有新的功能和人工智能特性
- 可以投射视频和管理家电
- 荣获2024年CES创新奖提名

Moonbird

- 通过引导呼吸练习减轻压力的设备
- 监测心率并提供减压呼吸练习
- 售价199美元可购买
